title: Question about Worlds Missions and Master Pass
body:
How many Championship Tokens I will earn from missions when I bought Master Pass?

(Done last week missions and all of the current ones, just curious if I will be able to afford Ashe Chroma and Login Screen Border)

replies.body: Our [announcement page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot) breaks down the tokens awarded for each mission, but the grand total including free missions would put you at 735!
